S04bsu006_u:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahātā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:2_1_0: tadyathā āyuṣmatā cājñātakauṇḍinyena āyuṣmatā ca mahānāmnā āyuṣmatā ca revatena āyuṣmatā
S04bsu006_u:2_1_1: ca vakkulena āyuṣmatā ca śāriputreṇa āyuṣmatā ca pūrṇena maitrāyaṇīputreṇa ca śrāvakaniyutaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:2_2: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthurdvātriṃśatā bodhisattvasahasraiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:2_3_0: tadyathā sahacittotpādadharmacakrapravartanena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anikṣiptadhureṇa
S04bsu006_u:2_3_1: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena avalokiteśvareṇa
S04bsu006_u:2_3_2: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsthāmaprāptena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04bsu006_u:2_5: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthuḥ /
S04bsu006_u:2_6: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramātraḥ śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat /
S04bsu006_u:2_9: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ śrutamātreṇa pātraṃ cakrikaṃ śikyaṃ bhagavate upanāmayāmāsa /
S04bsu006_u:3_0: yadā tvaṃ praviśasi piṇḍapātika vimocaye tvaṃ bahavaṃ hi prāṇinām /
S04bsu006_u:3_1: uttāraye tvaṃ bahavaṃ hi sattvā narakabhayājjātijarāmahābhayā //
S04bsu006_u:3_3: mahānubhāvo varadakṣiṇīyo vimocayitvā punaraṃ hi āgamī //
S04bsu006_u:4_0: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavata imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:4_1: atha bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ nātidūre sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:4_2: atha te sarve gavākṣatoraṇaniryūhakā hiraṇyamayāḥ sphaṭikamayā rūpyamayāḥ prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:4_3: tathā śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃsthito 'bhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:4_4: atha sa janakāyaḥ saṃśayajāto babhūva ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ nagarasya śubhanimittaṃ prādurabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:4_6: atha tatra janakāye anekavarṣaśatasahasrakoṭīko [Asv_105] vṛddhamahallakaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:4_8: mā bhaiṣurbhoḥ kulaputrāḥ / asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraḥ /
S04bsu006_u:4_9: tatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu006_u:4_12: atha sa janakāyastaṃ jīrṇakaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtāñjalirevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:4_13: yattasya bhagavatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya guṇavarṇasamudīraṇasamaye idaṃ śubhanimittamabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:4_14: dṛṣṭamātrasya tasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāro bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:4_15: atha sa jīrṇakapuruṣastaṃ janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇasamudīraṇatayā gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:5_0: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe saṃsāraduḥkhā vinimuktu so naro /
S04bsu006_u:5_1: āpāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate svargaṃ ca so yāsyati śīghramevam //
S04bsu006_u:5_2: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe dṛḍhapratijño bahukalpakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:5_4: so bodhisattvo sthita gaṅgavālukān kadāci so gacchati durgatī bhayam /
S04bsu006_u:5_5: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe āpāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate //
S04bsu006_u:5_6: kalpānakoṭīnayutānacintiyā rājā sa bhotī sada cakravartī /
S04bsu006_u:5_8: yat kiñci pūrvaṃ sada pāpu yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati śīghrametat /
S04bsu006_u:5_10: sukhāvatīṃ gacchati buddhakṣetraṃ paryaṅkabaddho sa ca bodhisattvo /
S04bsu006_u:5_12: apāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhārayet /
S04bsu006_u:6_0: atha sa jīrṇakaḥ purūṣo janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:6_1: atha bhagavān pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhut /
S04bsu006_u:6_2: tatra ca nagaradvāre dvādaśakoṭyaḥ padmānāṃ prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:6_3: teṣu ca padmeṣu dvādaśakoṭyo bodhisattvānāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ [Asv_107] prādurabhūvan prāñjalayaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:6_4_0: atha bhagavataḥ praviṣṭamātreṇa śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ navanavatikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu006_u:7_0: atha bhagavān ānandena saha nagaravalambikāyā dārikāya gṛhe samāgato 'bhūta /
S04bsu006_u:7_1: atha bhagavān nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe cakrikaṃ kaṭakaṭāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu006_u:7_2: atha sā dārikā taṃ cakrīśabdaṃ śrutvā saṃśayajātābhūt /
S04bsu006_u:7_3: ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ / mama gṛhe na kadācit piṇḍapātika āgato 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:7_4: atha sa nagaravalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī paridevantī sthitābhūt tīkṣṇadhāramasiṃ gaveṣantī paridevantī rudantī sthitābhūt /
S04bsu006_u:7_5: atha sā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā paridevantī aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:8_0: aho bata duḥkhu daridrake gṛhe varaṃ mama maraṇu na cāpi jīvitam /
S04bsu006_u:8_1: kiṃ cāpi me kāryuṣu jīvitena yadyaivāhaṃ duḥkhu śarīra pīḍitam //
S04bsu006_u:8_3: anāthabhūtā ahamadyameva yadyaivāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe // [Asv_108]
S04bsu006_u:9_0: atha sa nagaravalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitābhūt /
S04bsu006_u:10_1: paśyeccedimāṃ bhagavān / anekaduṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasracīrṇacaritaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgato nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:10_2_0: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputraḥ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ
S04bsu006_u:10_2_1: gṛhītvā kāśikāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā yena nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhaṃ tenopasaṅkrānto
S04bsu006_u:10_4: prāvara dārike imāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi imānyanekaśatasahasramūlyānyābharaṇāni /
S04bsu006_u:10_5: prāvṛtya cedaṃ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā imaṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantamupanāmaya /
S04bsu006_u:10_6: atha sā dārikā tāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi prāvṛtya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā taṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntā /
S04bsu006_u:10_9: pariṇāmaya tvaṃ dārike yathā pariṇāmitaṃ vipaśyiśikhiviśvabhūkkakutasundakanakamunikāśyapaprabhṛtibhiḥ sadbhistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksambuddhaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:10_11: atha sā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā [Asv_109] bhagavantamupanāmayāmāsa /
S04bsu006_u:10_12: anena piṇḍapātakuśalamūlena mā kaśmiṃścid daridragṛhe upapadyeya /
S04bsu006_u:11_0: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā bhagavate dattvā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā /
S04bsu006_u:11_3: tadahaṃ parikīrtayiṣyāmi / atha sā dārikā pratinivṛtya sarvāṅgapraṇipātena bhagavantaṃ prapatitā /
S04bsu006_u:11_4: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:12_0: avaśyaṃ me pūrvakṛtena karmaṇā yenāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe /
S04bsu006_u:12_1: karohi kāruṇya mamaṃ hi duḥkhita vinivartayasva narakā hi pālān //
S04bsu006_u:12_2: karohi kāruṇya mama duḥkhitāyā istribhāvā upapannu nāyaka /
S04bsu006_u:12_3: tvaṃ lokanātha jaravyādhiśoka vimocaye maṃ mama duḥkhitāyāḥ //
S04bsu006_u:12_4: trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ vimocayāhī mama duḥkhitāyāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:12_5: kṛtaṃ hi nātha praṇidhiṃ tvayā hi ye keci sattvā iha jambudvīpe // [Asv_110]
S04bsu006_u:12_6: tiṣṭhanti ye vai daśasu diśāsu sattvā hi sarve sukhitā kariṣye /
S04bsu006_u:12_7: sarve ca haṃ mocayi duḥkhasāgarāt trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam //
S04bsu006_u:12_8: tvayaṃ hi nātha mayi mocayī jagat avaśyaṃ me pūrvakṛtena karmaṇā /
S04bsu006_u:12_9: yenāhaṃ jātu daridrake gṛhe trāṇaṃ bhavāhī mama duḥkhitāyāḥ //
S04bsu006_u:12_10: bhavaṃ tu nātha jaravyādhimocakaṃ trāṇaṃ bhavāhī guṇa sañcitāgra /
S04bsu006_u:12_11: na cā kariṣye punareva pāpaṃ yadvedayāmī imi vedanāni //
S04bsu006_u:12_12: kṛpaṃ jani...............magra sattvā trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam /
S04bsu006_u:12_13: ye keci sattvā iha jambudvīpe nāmaṃ ca vai dhāraya paśca kāle //
S04bsu006_u:12_15: yatakiñci pāpaṃ tadapūrva yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati śīghrametat //
S04bsu006_u:13_0: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā punarapi gṛhagamanamārabdhā /
S04bsu006_u:13_1: atha bhagavān tāṃ nagaravalambikāṃ [Asv_111] dārikāṃ kalaviṅkarutasvaranirghoṣeṇaivamāha /
S04bsu006_u:13_2: pratinivartasva dārike pūrvajātinidānaṃ samanusmarāmi tadahaṃ parikīrtayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:14_0: parikīrtaya lokavināyakādya yadyat kṛtaṃ pāpa sadā sudāruṇam /
S04bsu006_u:14_1: avaśya me pāpu kṛtaṃ sudāruṇaṃ yenāhaṃ jātu daridrake gṛhe //
S04bsu006_u:14_2: tvaṃ sārthavāhu iha sarvaloke vimocaye mam iha istribhāvā /
S04bsu006_u:14_3: trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ kṛtajñahaṃ nitya bhavāmi nāyake //
S04bsu006_u:14_4: saṃśrāvaye mam imu dharmanetrī nāsau kadācittajate apāyam /
S04bsu006_u:14_5: saṃśodhayī karma yathākṛtaṃ mayā trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam //
S04bsu006_u:14_6: asaṅgajñānī varalokanāyaka vandāmi nātha śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjalī //
S04bsu006_u:15_1_0: bhūtapūrvo dārike atīte 'dhvani asaṅkhyeyaiḥ kalpai ratnaśikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan
S04bsu006_u:15_1_2: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu006_u:15_2: tena [Asv_112] khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatī nāma rājadhānyabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:15_3: tena khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ padmaprabho nāma gṛhapatirabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:15_5: tena khalu punaḥ samayena grāmanagaranigamajanapadeṣu piṇḍapātiko bhikṣuḥ piṇḍapātāyāvatarati /
S04bsu006_u:15_6: yadā tvadgṛhamāgato 'bhūta tadā tvaṃ dārike piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gṛhānniṣkrāntā punareva praviṣṭā 'bhūḥ /
S04bsu006_u:15_8: tena karmopacayena tvayā dārike dvādaśakalpasahasrāṇi punaḥ punardaridragṛhe duḥkhānyanubhūtāni /
S04bsu006_u:15_9: ekena tvayā dārike kuśalamūlena bodhivyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyase /
S04bsu006_u:15_10_0: yattvayā tasya bhikṣo rūpaliṅgasaṃsthā na dṛṣṭā bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ dārike anāgate 'dhvani
S04bsu006_u:15_10_1: acintyairaparimāṇaiḥ kalpairnagaradhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ
S04bsu006_u:15_10_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho
S04bsu006_u:15_11: atha sā dārikā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvaivamāha /
S04bsu006_u:15_12: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan mama buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatraivāhaṃ buddho bhaviṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:15_13: bhagavānāha / aparimitaguṇasañcayā nāma sā buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:15_14: yādṛaśī ca sā sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ tādṛśaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:16_0: atha ca sā dārikā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā /
S04bsu006_u:16_2: tvaṃ dārike saptame divase kālaṃ kariṣyasi /
S04bsu006_u:16_3: kālaṃ kṛtvā / pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājā ajitaseno nāma /
S04bsu006_u:16_5: tasya khalu punā rājño 'jitasenasya putro janiṣyase /
S04bsu006_u:16_6: eṣa eva tava paścimo garbhavāso bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:17_0: atha bhagavān paścimakena nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastyā mahānagaryā niṣkrānto yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:17_1: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:18_1: yadā tvayā āgatu piṇḍapātikā vimocayitvā iha sarvasattvā //
S04bsu006_u:18_2: sukhena saṃsthāpayi sarvasattvā maitrībalaṃ sarvajagattvayā kṛtam /
S04bsu006_u:18_3: sa piṇḍapātaṃ varamāṇḍanāyaka vimocitaste jagatī bhayā ca //
S04bsu006_u:18_4: ye bodhisattvā iha jambudvīpe sarve ca mārgaṃ tava darśayanti /
S04bsu006_u:18_5: [Asv_114] parinirvṛtasya sada paścakāle dhāretu sūtram imu buddhavarṇitam /
S04bsu006_u:19_0: athāyuṣmānānanda imā gāthā bhāṣitvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ puratastasthau /
S04bsu006_u:19_2: gacchānanda gaṇḍīmākoṭaya / te śrāvakāḥ paribhokṣyanti piṇḍapātam /
S04bsu006_u:19_5: bhagavānāha / śṛṇu ānanda gaṇḍīśabdasya kuśalamūlaṃ parikīrtayāmi /
S04bsu006_u:19_6: ye kecidānanda gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtyāni parikṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu006_u:19_8: ānanda āha / kīdṛśaṃ bhagavaṃstaiḥ sattvaiḥ kuśalamūlamavaropim /
S04bsu006_u:19_9_0: bhagavānāha / śṛṇu ānanda ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye mama parinirvṛtasya
S04bsu006_u:19_9_2: ye sattvā vā araṇyāyatane gaṇḍayākoṭanaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti namo buddhāyeti kariṣyanti
S04bsu006_u:19_12: atha tena gaṇḍīśabdena sarve te mahāśrāvakāḥ sannipatitā abhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:19_13: yathā yathā āsane niṣaṇṇāḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjante sma /
S04bsu006_u:19_14: atha tatraiva śrāvakamadhye nandimitro nāma mahāśrāvakaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:19_16: gaccha tvaṃ nandimitra mahāśrāvaka pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya kalyāṇamitraparicaryāṃ kuru /
S04bsu006_u:19_21: na te sattvāste śakṣyante bālāgramapi kampayituṃ prāgeva jīvitādvyavaropayitum /
S04bsu006_u:19_22: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvakaḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye suvarṇavarṇaṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya yena pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenānukrānto 'bhut /
S04bsu006_u:19_23: atha rājā ajitasenastaṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:19_25: gacchainaṃ bhikṣumānaya / tadā so 'mātyo yena nandimitro mahāśrāvakastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ [Asv_116] /
S04bsu006_u:19_27: āgaccha mahāśrāvaka bhikṣo rājā te ājñāpayati /
S04bsu006_u:19_29: mama rājñā kiṃ kāryaṃ mama rājā kiṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:19_32: na ca sa bhikṣustava pārśve āgacchati /
S04bsu006_u:19_35: atha sa rājā svakenaivātmabhāvena yena sa nandimitramahāśrāvakastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:19_37: āgaccha bho bhikṣo mama rājadhānīṃ praviśa /
S04bsu006_u:19_38: atha rājā ajitaseno dakṣiṇahaste taṃ bhikṣuṃ gṛhītvā svakāṃ rājadhānīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:19_39: atha rājñājitasenena nandimitrasya bhikṣoḥ siṃhāsanaṃ dattamabhut /
S04bsu006_u:19_40: atha rājājitaseno bhadrapīṭhake niṣadya taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:19_41: kutra tvaṃ bhikṣo gacchasi / ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ / atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānamajitasenamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:19_42: ye kecid bhikṣupravrajitāste sarve bhikṣāhārāḥ piṇḍapātamavacarantaḥ paribhuñjanti /
S04bsu006_u:19_46: yadi te bhikṣo mama svamāṃsena kāryaṃ svamāṃsaṃ dāsyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:20_0: bhuñjāmi tadbhojanu yad dadāhi mṛṣṭānnapānaṃ rasapānamuktamam /
S04bsu006_u:20_1: kleśā hi nirmukta tvayā bhaviṣyasi sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābham //
S04bsu006_u:20_2: sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakasya śraddhāprasādaṃ paramaṃ sudurlabham /
S04bsu006_u:20_3: ye śāsane pravrajitā ca bhikṣavā sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakānām //
S04bsu006_u:20_4: sudurlabhaṃ sugatavarasya darśanaṃ namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāvo /
S04bsu006_u:20_5: namo 'stu te dharmamayaṃ mahāmune namo 'stu te kleśavicakṣaṇāryam //
S04bsu006_u:20_6: namo 'stu te sarvajarapramokṣaṇāt namo 'stu te mārganidarśanāryam /
S04bsu006_u:20_7: namo 'stu te mārgapathasya darśakaṃ namo 'stu te bodhipathasya darśakam //
S04bsu006_u:21_0: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānamajitasenaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:21_1: atha rājānamajitasenaṃ taṃ nandimitro mahāśrāvako gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:22_0: sudurlabhaṃ bhikṣu tathaiva darśanaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya bhaveya darśanam / [Asv_118]
S04bsu006_u:22_1: ye bhikṣusaṅghasya dadeya dānaṃ na tasya yakṣā na ca rākṣasāśca //
S04bsu006_u:22_2: na pretakuṣmāṇḍamahoragāśca vighnaṃ na kurvanti kadāci teṣām /
S04bsu006_u:22_3: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya manuṣyalābham //
S04bsu006_u:22_4: yo durlabhaṃ darśanu bhikṣubhāvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ kalpaśatairacintiyaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:22_5: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhāraye kalpāna koṭīnayutānacintiyā //
S04bsu006_u:22_6: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam /
S04bsu006_u:22_7: na tasya bhotī vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam //
S04bsu006_u:22_8: kalyāṇamitraṃ mama mārgadarśako (yaṃ) sa āgatāye mama piṇḍapātikā /
S04bsu006_u:22_9: yo dāsyate asya hi piṇḍapātaṃ muktā na bheṣyanti jarārtavyādhayā //
S04bsu006_u:22_10: kleśā vinirmukta sadā tu bheṣyati ye tasya dāsyantiha piṇḍapātam //
S04bsu006_u:23_0: atha sa rājā ajitaseno nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:23_2: evamastu mahārāja bhuñje piṇḍapāta tava gṛhe /
S04bsu006_u:23_3: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ khādanīyena bhojanīyena taṃ nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ santarpayati sma /
S04bsu006_u:24_1: kiṃ tava mahārāja asmin pṛthivīpradeśe udyānabhūmirasti /
S04bsu006_u:24_2: rājā āha / asti mahāśrāvaka udyānabhūmirmama ramaṇīyā suśobhanā /
S04bsu006_u:24_3_0: nandimitra āha / gacchāmyahaṃ mahārāja / tāmudyānabhūmiṃ prekṣe / rājā āha / gaccha
S04bsu006_u:24_3_1: nandimitra / udyānabhūmiṃ prekṣasva / atha nandimitramahāśrāvako yena rājño 'jitasenasyodyānabhūmistenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:24_4: atha tatrodyānabhūmau ye udyānaguṇāste sarve santīti /
S04bsu006_u:24_5: yā graiṣmikyaḥ puṣkariṇyastāḥ śītalajalaparipūrṇā yā vārṣikyastā nātyuṣṇā nātiśītalajalaparipūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:24_9: [Asv_120] ye tiryagyonigatāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ śukaśārikācakravākamayūrakokilādayaste nānārutāni kurvanti sma /
S04bsu006_u:24_10: atha tatraiva udyānabhūmau suvarṇavarṇāḥ suvarṇatuṇḍāḥ suvarṇapakṣāḥ suvarṇapādāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:24_12: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako yena rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:24_14: āgatastvaṃ mahāśrāvaka / dṛṣṭodyānabhūmiḥ / nandimitra āha / dṛṣṭā mayodyānabhūmī ramaṇīyā suśobhanā /
S04bsu006_u:24_15: atha nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ rājā ajitaseno gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:25_1: aśokamucilinda tathaiva pāṭalā saugandhikāśca sumanā ca vārṣikā //
S04bsu006_u:25_2: tadā pāriyātrā nadītīranirmitā suvarṇavarṇā sada pakṣiṇā abhūt /
S04bsu006_u:26_0: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājño 'jitasenasya gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:26_1: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhante sma /
S04bsu006_u:26_4: atha sa rājā āha / hastirathaṃ ca aśvarathaṃ ca sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
S04bsu006_u:26_6: atha tā amātyakoṭyo vacanaṃ śrutvā śīghrameva tad hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:26_7: atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtamātreṇa rājājitaseno yena sodyānabhūmistenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:26_9: asmin pṛthivīpradeśe mahārāja mama kuṭikaṃ kārayitavyam yatrāhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇastava gṛhe piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:26_12: nandimitra āha / yādṛśāstava mahārāja mahācittotpādaśraddhāprasādāstādṛśaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya /
S04bsu006_u:26_17: rājā ajitasena evamāha / triṃśadyojanāni dīrgheṇa ṣaḍyojanānyūrdhvāyāṃ saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya /
S04bsu006_u:26_19: saptaratnamayaṃ [Asv_122] maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānamajitasenamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:26_21: rājā āha / tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe caṅkramaḥ kārayitavyaścaturyojanāni dīrgheṇa dve yojane vistāreṇa /
S04bsu006_u:26_22: atha so 'mātyastaṃ caṅkramaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:27_0: kṛtaṃ mayā caṅkramu suṣṭhu śobhanaṃ ājñā tvayā yat kṛtapūrvameva ca /
S04bsu006_u:27_1: sattvāna moceti prakṛtiṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vimocaye prāṇina sarvametat //
S04bsu006_u:27_2: aho sulabdhā praṇidhīkṛtaṃ tvayā vimocayī sarvajagat sadevakam /
S04bsu006_u:27_3: praṇidhiṃ kṛtaṃ yattvayamīdṛśaṃ bhave dharmaṃ prakāśeti me dharmabhāṇako //
S04bsu006_u:27_4: niṣaṇṇa sthitvā kuṭikā ca caṅkrame ājñā kṛtaṃ yat tvaya yādṛśī kṛtā /
S04bsu006_u:27_5: sa caṅkramaṃ caiva kṛtaṃ suśobhanaṃ maṇiratnasañcchādita taṃ ca bhūmim //
S04bsu006_u:28_0: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:28_1: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ pratinivṛtya tatraiva [Asv_123] kuṭike niṣaṇṇo vikiraṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:28_2: anyena keśānanyena nayānānyanyena dantānanyena grīvā anyena bāhū anyena hṛdayamanyenodaramanyenorū anyena jaṅghe anyena pādau samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:28_3: atha sa rājā ajitasenaḥ saptāhasyātyayena taṃ bhikṣuṃ na paśyati /
S04bsu006_u:29_3: atha sa rājā saputro yena sā kuṭikā tenopasaṅkrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:29_4: atha sa rājā ajitasenastaṃ bhikṣumātmabhāvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayajāto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:29_5: santrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭyan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putramevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:29_8: atha sa rājakumāraḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:30_0: mā śokacittasya bhave nṛpendra mā vedayī vedanamīdṛśāni /
S04bsu006_u:30_1: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi /
S04bsu006_u:30_4: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣairna bhūtairna ca rākṣasaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:30_12: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim /
S04bsu006_u:31_0: atha sa rājakumārastaṃ pitaraṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:31_2: kathaṃ tvaṃ kumāra jānīṣe yadayaṃ bhikṣuḥ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:31_3: atha sa rājakumāra evamāha / paśya mahārāja ayaṃ bhikṣurbodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ sarvakleśavinirmukto bhavasāgarapāraṅgataḥ sarvasattvahitārthaṃ ca mārgaṃ darśayate śubham /
S04bsu006_u:31_6: atha sa rājā sa ca rājakumāro bahubhirdārakaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sa caṅkramastenopasaṅkrāntau /
S04bsu006_u:32_0: atha rājā taṃ bhikṣū dṛṣṭvā maulipaṭṭaṃ rājakumārasya dadāti /
S04bsu006_u:32_1: tava rājyaṃ bhavatu / dharmeṇa pālaye nādharmeṇa / rājakumāra āha / bahūnyasaṅkhyeyāni rājakāryāṇi mayā kṛtāni /
S04bsu006_u:32_2: na ca kadācittṛptirāsīt / tava tāta rājyaṃ bhavatu / na mama rājyena kāryaṃ na bhogena naiśvaryādhipatyena kāryam /
S04bsu006_u:32_3: tava rājyaṃ bhavatu tāta / dharmeṇa pālaye nādharmeṇeti /
S04bsu006_u:33_0: atha rājā yena sa bhikṣustenopasaṅkrāntaḥ prāñjalirevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:34_2: ye darśanaṃ dāsyati tubhyamārṣā muktā ca so bheṣyati kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:34_3: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇute muhūrtam //
S04bsu006_u:36_0: niṣadya yugye ratanāmaye śubhe vrajāmyahaṃ yena sa rājadhānīm /
S04bsu006_u:36_2: sūkṣmāṇi jālāni ca saṃhitāni yāṃ cīvarāṃ tubhya dadāmi adya //
S04bsu006_u:37_0: atha sa bhikṣū ratnamaye yugye gṛhītvā yena rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:37_1: santarpito bhojanena / atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājānamajitasenaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:38_1: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ te bodhimaṇḍena cireṇa gacchata //
S04bsu006_u:38_2: sudurlabhaṃ darśana nāyakasya na cireṇa so gacchati buddhakṣetram /
S04bsu006_u:39_0: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ ajitasenasya rājño gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:39_1: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhanti sma /
S04bsu006_u:39_2: atha tena bherīśabdena sarvāstā amātyakoṭyo rājānamevamāhuḥ /
S04bsu006_u:39_4: rājā āha / saptame divase hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
S04bsu006_u:39_5: ahaṃ saptame divase jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ gamiṣyāmi śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya [Asv_127] /
S04bsu006_u:39_8: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathe avaruhya taṃ ca nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ ratnamaye rathe avarohya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:39_9: atha bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān sarvaśrāvakānāmantrayata /
S04bsu006_u:39_11: atha te sarve mahāśrāvakā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannā abhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:39_12: atha rājā dūratastaṃ jvālāmālaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandimitramahāśrāvakamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:39_14: nandimitra āha / atra śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ sthitiṃ dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati /
S04bsu006_u:39_15: te ca bodhisattvā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:39_16: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathādavatīrya pādābhyāṃ putrasahasreṇa sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:39_17: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇena kāyena vyāmaprabhayā caṅkramate sma /
S04bsu006_u:39_18: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavato rūpavarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitvā dharaṇitale nipatitaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:39_19: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya taṃ rājānamutthāpayati sma /
S04bsu006_u:40_1: na me kadācidiha dṛṣṭarūpaṃ tvaṃ lokanātho varadakṣiṇīyo //
S04bsu006_u:40_3: dvātṛṃśatā lakṣaṇadhāriṇaṃ mune nāsau kadācidvrajate apāyabhūmim /
S04bsu006_u:40_4: yo lokanāthasya hi rūpu paśye tvaṃ lokanāthā śirasā namasyāmī //
S04bsu006_u:41_2: atha bhagavān tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:41_3: alabdhalābhā ye tatra mama śāsanaṃ vaistārikaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu006_u:41_5: gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja svagṛhe saptame divase āgamiṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:42_0: atha rājā ajitasenastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣuṃ purataḥsthāpya svagṛhaṃ gatvā sarvānamātyānāmantrayate sma /
S04bsu006_u:42_1: sarvairgrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ gṛhe gṛhe dhvajānyucchrāpitavyāni gṛhe gṛhe ratnamayāni [Asv_129] kumbhāni paripūrayitavyāni /
S04bsu006_u:42_3: sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhitaṃ dhvajānyucchrāpitāni ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūritāni /
S04bsu006_u:42_4: yatra rājā ajitasenaḥ prativasati tatra dvādaśakoṭyo dhvajānāmucchrāpitā dvādaśakoṭyo ratnamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ paripūritāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:42_6: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ puṣpapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kalyāṇamitraṃ purataḥsthāpya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakiran bhagavantamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:42_10: atha bhagavān siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇo rājño 'jitasenasya dharmān deśitavān /
S04bsu006_u:42_11: atha rājñā ajitasenena prabhūtenāhāreṇa khādanīyena bhojanīyena santarpitaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:42_12: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhakaṃ rājakumāraṃ dadāti /
S04bsu006_u:43_0: mā vilamba kurute tāta mā khedaṃ kiñci yāsyasi /
S04bsu006_u:43_1: aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna darśanaṃ aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna lābham //
S04bsu006_u:43_2: aho sulabdhaṃ paramaṃ hi lābhaṃ pravrajyalābhaṃ sugatena varṇitam /
S04bsu006_u:43_3: saṃsāramokṣo sugatena varṇitaṃ pravrajya śīghraṃ ma vilamba tāta //
S04bsu006_u:43_5: sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābhaṃ sudurlabhaṃ darśanu nāyakānām /
S04bsu006_u:43_6: śīghaṃ ca pravrajya mayā hi labdhaṃ prāptaṃ mayā uttamamagrabodhim /
S04bsu006_u:43_7: śrutvā na rājā tada putravākyaṃ sa pravrajī śāsani nāyakasya //
S04bsu006_u:44_0: atha rājakumāro 'ntarīkṣagato gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:44_1: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ putrasya vākyaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra [Asv_131] āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantamuddiśya vihāraṃ kārayati sma /
S04bsu006_u:44_3: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:44_6: bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ pravrājya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastena gamanamārabdhavān /
S04bsu006_u:45_1: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno rājyaṃ parityajya vihāraṃ kārayitvā bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:45_3: bhagavānāha / sādhu sādhu ānanda yattvayā parikīrtitam /
S04bsu006_u:45_4: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno mama śāsane pravrajito bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:45_5_1: 'rhan samyak sambuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu006_u:45_5_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu006_u:45_6: ānanda āha / ayaṃ nandimitramahāśrāvako rājñaḥ kalyāṇa mitramabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:45_8: bhagavānāha / [Asv_132] ayamānanda nandimitramahāśrāvakastatraiva kālasamaye nandiprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho loke bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:45_9: ānanda āha / kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:45_10: bhagavānāha / aparimitaguṇasañcayā nāma sā buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatreme tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu006_u:45_11: ānanda āha / ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye samprakāśayiṣyati tasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyaskandho bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:45_12: bhagavānāha / yadā mayānanda duṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi caritvā bodhirabhisambuddhā tadā te sattvā bodhimabhisambhotsyante /
S04bsu006_u:45_13: ya etaddharmaparyāyāt catuṣpadikāmapi gāthāṃ śroṣyanti avaivartikāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau /
S04bsu006_u:45_14: ānanda āha / ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dharmabhāṇakāḥ samprakāśayiṣyanti teṣāṃ kīdṛśaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:45_15: bhagavānāha / śṛṇu ānanda rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ /
S04bsu006_u:45_16: ya imaṃ dhamaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ samprakāśayiṣyanti muktāśca bhaviṣyanti jātijarāvyādhiparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimuktā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu006_u:45_17: ānanda āha / ye paścime kāle paścime samaye sattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti teṣāṃ kā gatirbhaviṣyati kaḥ parāyaṇam /
S04bsu006_u:45_18: [Asv_133] bhagavānāha / alamalamānanda / mā me pāpakaṃ karmaskandhaṃ paripṛccha /
S04bsu006_u:45_22: sugato bhagavānāha / śruṇu ānanda saddharmapratikṣepakasya gatiṃ parikīrtayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:45_23: raurave mahānarake hāhahe mahānarake avīcau mahānarake tiryagyonau yamaloke ca pretaviṣaye bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhamanubhavitavyam /
S04bsu006_u:45_27: mā bhoḥ kulaputrā bhoḥ kvacit saddharmaṃ pratikṣepaṣyatha /
S04bsu006_u:45_29: ānanda āha / kena hetunā bhagavan saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhavati /
S04bsu006_u:45_30_0: bhagavānāha / ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye eteṣāṃ sūtrānudhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmākrośiṣyanti
S04bsu006_u:45_30_1: paribhāṣiṣyante kutsayiṣyanti paṃsayiṣyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya duṣṭacittamutpādayiṣyanti
S04bsu006_u:45_31: bhaviṣyati / yaḥ sattvaḥ [Asv_134] trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāmakṣīṇyutpāṭayet ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandho bhavet /
S04bsu006_u:45_32: evameva ya eteṣāṃ sūtradhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ duṣṭacittaprekṣitā ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyate /
S04bsu006_u:47_1: na came īdṛśaṃ sūtraṃ śrutapūrvaṃ kadācana //
S04bsu006_u:47_3: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśiṣye dhārayiṣye imaṃ nayam //
S04bsu006_u:48_0: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavato gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:49_1: subhāṣitaṃ sūtra mahānubhāvagaṃ gambhīradharmaṃ nipuṇaṃ sudurdṛśam // [Asv_135]
S04bsu006_u:49_2: prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ niruttaraṃ mā paścakāle parinirvṛte jite /
S04bsu006_u:50_2: namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāva prakāśitaṃ sutramidaṃ niruttaram /
S04bsu006_u:50_3: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyakā likhiṣyati sūtrametaṃ niruttaram //
S04bsu006_u:50_4: na cāpi so gacchati durgatībhayaṃ svargaṃ ca so gacchati kṣiprametat //
S04bsu006_u:52_2: ahaṃ hi paścime kāle nirvṛte tvayi nāyake /
S04bsu006_u:54_0: namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāvā prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ tvayā śubham / [Asv_136]
S04bsu006_u:54_1: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyaka rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi ha sūtraratne //
S04bsu006_u:56_0: aho suramyaṃ varasūtraratnaṃ prakāśitam īdṛśa paścakāle /
S04bsu006_u:56_2: sugatāna vai lokavināyakānāṃ ahaṃ hi dhāriṣyam sūtraratnam /
S04bsu006_u:58_0: deyadharmoyaṃ bālosiṃhena sārdha bhāryājājatitrana sārdhaṃ mātāpitroḥ paramaduṣkartroḥ sārdhaṃ kṣīṇīena akhiloṭiena diśoṭajāja maṅgali.
